note.p: Chemist. Son of Allen Thomson. Educated at the University of Glasgow. Assistant demonstrator, King’s College London, 1871–9; senior demonstrator, and later head of department, 1879–1905; professor of chemistry, Queen’s College, Harley Street, London, 1880–7; vice-principal, King’s College, London, 1905–13. FRS 1897.
Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1 (1933): 91–4
